StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNWABySsn]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Ssn char(9) ) AS
DECLARE @NwaId int
SELECT @NwaId = [n].[NWA_ID] FROM [CONTRACT] AS [c] INNER JOIN [NWA] AS [n] ON [n].[NWA_ID] = [c].[NWA_ID] INNER JOIN [PERSON] AS [p] ON ([p].[PERSON_ID] = [n].[MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] AND [p].[SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER] = @Ssn)
EXEC GetNWAByID @NwaId
